chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is experiencing a problem as follows:
The quality of the speaker is very poor, especially for low-pitched sounds whether it's during a phone call or listening to music. To make the issue more noticeable, Apple's default ringtone 'Slide' is a good example.
This isn't a random fault: it's always present and very audible, especially during calls.
In addition, upon receiving the phone, we noticed a slight scratch on the screen at the top left corner which doesn't match the

Hello ecomobile,
You have received the product for repair, the 10/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 18/06/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Mavhy Michelle from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
